roleset.name: cause to have magnetic properties
roleset.note: MAGNETIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'magnetize' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4. (from magnetize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: magnetize-v: passive
example.text: The crowd moved in clumps, clumps-1 magnetized [*]-1 around an electronic nucleus.

roleset.name: name
roleset.note: MAGNETIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

role.descr: opposing force arg1 is attracted to/attracts

example.name: magnetic-j
example.text: It is not that power corrupts but that it is magnetic to the corruptable.

example.name: magnetic-j
example.text: For example , a body of magnetite or gabbro is strongly magnetic , and their magnetic signature makes them stand out from other rocks .
example.arg: a body of magnetite or gabbro
